text: Kim Kardashian Exposes The Weirdest Thing Kanye West Does The reality star was being grilled by Jennifer Laurence. Kim Kardashian has revealed the weirdest habit Kanye West has. The'Keeping Up With The Kardashians'star, who married'Ye in 2014, appeared on a recent episode of Jimmy Kimmel which was being guest hosted by Hollywood actress Jennifer Laurence. The Oscar - winner grilled Kardashian with a stream of personal questions, sharing laughs as they discussed farting, stalking exes and drunk dinner dates with Kris Jenner. When asked to reveal the weirdest thing Kanye does, Kim didn't hesitate to answer. A post shared by Kim Kardashian West ( @ kimkardashian ) onSep 20,
